entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 12:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
